Kasus Mayat dalam Karung, Serda N Awalnya Ditendang Lalu Cekik Istri
06 Nov 2019, 13:29 by Abdy Febriady
Polewali Mandar - Serda N tersangka pembunuhan istrinya, Jayanti, menjalani rekonstruksi kasus pembunuhan. Serda N awalnya cekcok lalu mencekik istri hingga tewas dan mayatnya dimasukkan ke dalam karung.
Dalam rekonstruksi yang digelar personel Detasemen Polisi Militer (Denpom) XIV/2 Pare-pare, Serda N memperagakan 60 adegan, Rabu (6/11/2019). Rekonstruksi diawali dari rumah korban di Desa Ugi Baru, Mapilli, Kabupaten Polewali Mandar, Sulbar.
Terungkap pembunuhan istri dilatarbelakangi kecemburuan Serda N. Serda N dan Jayanti kemudian cekcok pada 1 Oktober 2019.


Foto: Abdy Febriady/detikcom

"Ada indikasi kecemburuan," ujar Komandan Denpom Pare-pare, Letkol CPM Hermanto di lokasi rekonstruksi.
Sedangkan dari hasil pemeriksaan dan rekonstruksi, Serda N disebut tidak berencana membunuh istrinya.
"Sebenarnya di sini tidak ada perencanaan, cuma tersangka merasa sakit ditendang oleh korban, akhirnya emosi dan mencekik korban," jelas Hermanto.
Setelah membunuh istrinya, tersangka melarikan diri dan bersembunyi di rumah keluarga di daerah pegunungan Kabupaten Polewali Mandar.
Saat rekonstruksi berlangsung, kerabat korban sempat berupaya mendekati tersangka. Rekonstruksi ini dijaga ketat personel TNI dan Kepolisian.
"Sebagai keluarga mudah-mudahan dia bisa dihukum seumur hidup bahkan dihukum mati, seberat-beratnya. Kita sebagai keluarga merasa tidak tenang jika tersangka belum dihukum " ujar keluarga korban, Hajja Erna.

Case of Corpse in a Sack, Serda N was initially kicked then strangled his wife
Nov 06 2019, 13:29 by Abdy Febriady
Polewali Mandar - Serda N suspect of murder of his wife, Jayanti, undergoing reconstruction of a murder case. Serda N initially bicker then strangled his wife to death and put his body in a sack.
In the reconstruction that was held by the Military Police Detachment (Denpom) XIV / 2 Pare-pare personnel, Serda N demonstrated 60 scenes on Wednesday (11/06/2019). The reconstruction began at the victim's home in Ugi Baru Village, Mapilli, Polewali Mandar Regency, West Sulawesi.
It was revealed that the wife's murder was motivated by jealousy of Serda N. Serda N and Jayanti then bickering on October 1, 2019.


Photo: Abdy Febriady / detikcom

"There is an indication of jealousy," said Commander of the National Police 'Pare-pare, Lt. Col. CPM Hermanto at the reconstruction site.
While from the results of the examination and reconstruction, Serda N is said to have no plans to kill his wife.
"Actually, there is no planning here, only the suspect feels pain being kicked by the victim, ultimately emotional and strangling the victim," Hermanto explained.
After killing his wife, the suspect fled and hid in a family home in the mountainous area of Polewali Mandar Regency.
During the reconstruction, the victim's relatives tried to approach the suspect. This reconstruction is heavily guarded by TNI and Police personnel.
"As a family, hopefully he can be sentenced for life and even sentenced to death, as much as possible. We as a family feel uneasy if the suspect has not been punished," said the victim's family, Hajja Erna.
